full_summary:
**Racking/Installation Tender Announcement**
================================================GLOBALS COMPOSANT [×] [×]
================================================Global Assemblage Global Pack._

================================================ Blazers =

* **Title**: Racking/Installation
* **Reference Number**: PW_HAL-420-11591
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-21
* **Closing Date**: 2022-11-24T13:00:00

**Summary**
-----------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting bids for the supply and installation of racking and cages to the existing racking at the external supply warehouse located at building SH30 in Shearwater, Nova Scotia. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Requirements**
------------

The required goods/services are:

* Supply and installation of racking and cages to existing racking at the external supply warehouse located at building SH30 in Shearwater, Nova Scotia.

**Specifications**
----------------

* Site visit: An optional site visit will be held at building SH30, 12 Wing Shearwater on Friday, October 28, 2023, beginning at 9:00 am.
* Date of contract: From date of contract to March 31, 2023 (inclusive).
* Delivery date: By March 31, 2023.
* Canadian content policy: Conditionally limited; Canadian content certification is required at bid closing.

**Inquiries**
------------

All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority:

Brian Secord
Email: [brian.secord@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.secord@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
Fax: (902) 496-5016

**Note**
----

Bid submissions must be made electronically through the Canada Buys platform. Please refer to the solicitation document for instructions on how to participate. A debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process may be requested by the bidder within 15 working days from receipt of the results.
